abstract.para: In this tutorial, you will create and test a mortgage application scenario using {PRODUCT} {PRODUCT_VERSION}. This procedures in this document are based on the included Mortgage_Process sample project. To save time, while ensuring that you understand how to create a working business process, you will create some assets from scratch, but will also utilize some of the pre-defined assests contained in the sample project. To expand on particular areas of interest, each chapter contains a link to generic examples of how to complete simliar tasks and expanded conceptual information.
